Dead by Daylight is a very unique multiplayer game with a style of gameplay that is only rarely seen anywhere else. There have been other asymmetrical games like DBD made before but none have ever lasted this long. Be warned that the community can be very toxic since the killer and survivor dynamic can create an "us vs them" kind of mentality for people. Also, know that the game is constantly changing, and with every big patch know that as people adapt to the meta, there will be times where you win more and times where you lose more than usual. If you can get past that and the community, this is a very fun and enjoyable game and a nice break from more traditional games.

I would have recommended this game to people a few months ago. But now the game is no fun to play as survivor. You literally get camped and tunneled out of the game. While the killer is getting more points by playing like this, you literally get nothing because you are getting tunneled and camped. You barely have the chance to escape. I sent an email to DBD addressing these concerns and got ignored.

Good 4 player co-op asymetric fun. Lots of nostalgia for horror genre fans. Quick matches perfect for 20-30 minutes of gaming. Gameplay itself is solid, but can get a little stale. Match-ups are very dependent on player skill, so you will have some bad or quick matches, but the match ends quickly. Environments and maps are beautiful.
If you like gore. This game is for you

Zudem gibt es jedes Perk was man sich vorstellen kann und noch 1000 mehr, weil man in diesem Spiel mit DLCs zugeballert wird weil die Devs Geld wollen.
